verses.verse: This then was the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> by their <S%H4940>families<s%>; even to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> was the uttermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of the south <S%H8486>coast<s%>.

And their <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> was from the <S%H7097>shore<s%> of the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, from the <S%H3956>bay<s%> that <S%H6437>looketh<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%>: bay: Heb. tongue

And it went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the south <S%H5045>side<s%> to <S%H4610>Maalehacrabbim<s%>, and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along to <S%H6790>Zin<s%>, and ascended <S%H5927>up<s%> on the south <S%H5045>side<s%> unto <S%H6947>Kadeshbarnea<s%>, and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along to <S%H2696>Hezron<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H146>Adar<s%>, and fetched a <S%H5437>compass<s%> to <S%H7173>Karkaa<s%>: Maalehacrebbim: or, the going up to Acrabbim

From thence it <S%H5674>passed<s%> toward <S%H6111>Azmon<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of that <S%H1366>coast<s%> were at the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: this shall be your <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>coast<s%>.

And the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> was the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, even unto the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>. And their <S%H1366>border<s%> in the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>quarter<s%> was from the <S%H3956>bay<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> at the uttermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>:

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1031>Bethhogla<s%>, and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along by the <S%H6828>north<s%> of <S%H1026>Betharabah<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H932>Bohan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>:

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> toward <S%H1688>Debir<s%> from the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor<s%>, and so <S%H6828>northward<s%>, <S%H6437>looking<s%> toward <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, that is <S%H5227>before<s%> the going <S%H4608>up<s%> to <S%H131>Adummim<s%>, which is on the south <S%H5045>side<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%>: and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> toward the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5885>Enshemesh<s%>, and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> thereof were at <S%H5883>Enrogel<s%>:

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%> unto the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>; the same is <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> that lieth <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>, which is at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of the <S%H7497>giants<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>:

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> was <S%H8388>drawn<s%> from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> unto the <S%H4599>fountain<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H5318>Nephtoah<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6085>Ephron<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> was <S%H8388>drawn<s%> to <S%H1173>Baalah<s%>, which is <S%H7157>Kirjathjearim<s%>:

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5437>compassed<s%> from <S%H1173>Baalah<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along unto the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H3297>Jearim<s%>, which is <S%H3693>Chesalon<s%>, on the north <S%H6828>side<s%>, and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H1053>Bethshemesh<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>on<s%> to <S%H8553>Timnah<s%>:

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%>: and the <S%H1366>border<s%> was <S%H8388>drawn<s%> to <S%H7942>Shicron<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>along<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1173>Baalah<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto <S%H2995>Jabneel<s%>; and the goings <S%H8444>out<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> were at the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

And the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> was to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and the <S%H1366>coast<s%> thereof. This is the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

And unto <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> a <S%H2506>part<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H413>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, even the <S%H7151>city<s%> of <S%H704>Arba<s%> <S%H7153><s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>, which city is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>. the city: or, Kirjatharba

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H3423>drove<s%> thence the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>, <S%H8344>Sheshai<s%>, and <S%H289>Ahiman<s%>, and <S%H8526>Talmai<s%>, the <S%H3211>children<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>.
And he went <S%H5927>up<s%> thence to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%>: and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1688>Debir<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> was <S%H7158>Kirjathsepher<s%>.

And <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, He that <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> <S%H7158>Kirjathsepher<s%>, and <S%H3920>taketh<s%> it, to him will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> my <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And <S%H6274>Othniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz<s%>, the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%>, <S%H3920>took<s%> it: and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H5915>Achsah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And it came to pass, as she <S%H935>came<s%> unto him, that she <S%H5496>moved<s%> him to <S%H7592>ask<s%> of her <S%H1>father<s%> a <S%H7704>field<s%>: and she lighted <S%H6795>off<s%> her <S%H2543>ass<s%>; and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, What wouldest thou?

Who <S%H559>answered<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> me a <S%H1293>blessing<s%>; for thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> me a <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>; <S%H5414>give<s%> me also <S%H1543>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>. And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> her the <S%H5942>upper<s%> <S%H1543>springs<s%>, and the <S%H8482>nether<s%> <S%H1543>springs<s%>.
This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

And the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> toward the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> were <S%H6909>Kabzeel<s%>, and <S%H5740>Eder<s%>, and <S%H3017>Jagur<s%>,

And <S%H3822>Lebaoth<s%>, and <S%H7978>Shilhim<s%>, and <S%H5871>Ain<s%>, and <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%>: all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%>, with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>:

And <S%H8189>Sharaim<s%>, and <S%H5723>Adithaim<s%>, and <S%H1449>Gederah<s%>, and <S%H1453>Gederothaim<s%>; <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>: and Gederothaim: or, or Gederothaim
From <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> even unto the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, all that lay <S%H3027>near<s%> <S%H795>Ashdod<s%>, with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>: near: Heb. by the place of

<S%H795>Ashdod<s%> with her <S%H1323>towns<s%> and her <S%H2691>villages<s%>, <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> with her <S%H1323>towns<s%> and her <S%H2691>villages<s%>, unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1366><s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> thereof:
And <S%H3241>Janum<s%>, and <S%H1054>Bethtappuah<s%>, and <S%H664>Aphekah<s%>, Janum: or, Janus
And <S%H2547>Humtah<s%>, and <S%H7153>Kirjatharba<s%>, which is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, and <S%H6730>Zior<s%>; <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>:
And <S%H5044>Nibshan<s%>, and the city of <S%H5898>Salt<s%>, and <S%H5872>Engedi<s%>; <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages<s%>.

As for the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3201><s%> not drive them <S%H3423>out<s%>: but the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
